title: Cannot access Mercurial repository
body:
I am trying to access a Mercurial repository via Spack. This fails with this error message:

```
==> Trying to clone Mercurial repository:
  https://bitbucket.org/yt_analysis/yt
abort: couldn't find mercurial libraries in [/usr/bin /xfs1/eschnetter/src/spack/opt/spack/linux-Ubuntu14-x86_64/gcc-6.1.1/py-funcsigs-0.4-j43xifssmk2qn6kjrhso5nmm7bao4dxp/lib/python2.7/site-packages/funcsigs-0.4-py2.7.egg /xfs1/eschnetter/src/spack/opt/spack/linux-Ubuntu14-x86_64/gcc-6.1.1/py-dateutil-2.5.2-o6xvkdkmvdovdvy6w6vaunblrtcmis6u/lib/python2.7/site-packages/python_dateutil-2.5.2-py2.7.egg /xfs1/eschnetter/src/spack/opt/spack/linux-Ubuntu14-x86_64/gcc-6.1.1/py-cython-0.23.5-qplq4k6ystfqjnre7mpm4pemvapatin4/lib/python2.7/site-packages /xfs1/eschnetter/src/spack/opt/spack/linux-Ubuntu14-x86_64/gcc-6.1.1/python-2.7.12-ce4wlum3tkujeyknvql7ibxfi5dskqpy/lib/python2.7 /xfs1/eschnetter/src/spack/opt/spack/linux-Ubuntu14-x86_64/gcc-6.1.1/python-2.7.12-ce4wlum3tkujeyknvql7ibxfi5dskqpy/lib/python2.7/plat-x86_64-linux-gnu /xfs1/eschnetter/src/spack/opt/spack/linux-Ubuntu14-x86_64/gcc-6.1.1/python-2.7.12-ce4wlum3tkujeyknvql7ibxfi5dskqpy/lib/python2.7/lib-old /nfs/galaxy/unixhome/eschnetter/.local/lib/python2.7/site-packages /xfs1/eschnetter/src/spack/opt/spack/linux-Ubuntu14-x86_64/gcc-6.1.1/python-2.7.12-ce4wlum3tkujeyknvql7ibxfi5dskqpy/lib/python2.7/site-packages]
(check your install and PYTHONPATH)
==> Fetching from [hg] https://bitbucket.org/yt_analysis/yt failed.
==> Error: All fetchers failed for py-yt-3.3-6bl2vyo7eyera3u4znvrjc64czzjyti7
==> Error: Installation process had nonzero exit code : 256
```

Mercurial is implemented in Python. Can it be that Spack sanitizes `PYTHONPATH`, thus disabling Mercurial?
